title: History-sheeter booked for cheating and criminal intimidation
content:
A person with a known criminal history (a "history-sheeter") has been booked.
*   The booking is primarily for the offense of cheating.
*   They also face charges related to criminal intimidation.

title: Bhatti tears into BRS on penultimate day of electioneering
content:
Bhatti launched a scathing attack on the BRS political party.
*   The criticism occurred on the second-to-last day of election campaigning.
*   This signifies intense political rhetoric in the crucial final moments before the election.

title: Hyderabad police commissioner presents awards to 1,446 personnel, introduces ‘Extra Mile’ recognition
content:
The Hyderabad police commissioner presented awards.
*   A total of 1,446 personnel received these awards.
*   A new ‘Extra Mile’ recognition program was also introduced.

title: Budget may cut reliance on foreign telescopes; trips on space spending
content:
The upcoming budget may lead to a reduction in overall space spending.
*   It plans to decrease the country's reliance on foreign telescopes.
*   Broader cutbacks are anticipated across various space-related projects and initiatives.

title: AAP leaders accuse Congress’ Bajwa of making derogatory remark against Punjab Cabinet Minister
content:
AAP leaders have leveled an accusation against Congress leader Bajwa.
*   The accusation alleges Bajwa made a derogatory remark.
*   This remark was reportedly aimed at a Punjab Cabinet Minister.

title: Rajasthani-Tamil Seva Awards presented
content:
**'Rajasthani-Tamil Seva Awards'** were recently presented.
*   The awards recognize individuals or organizations for their **service ('Seva')**.
*   The initiative highlights contributions and connections between **Rajasthani and Tamil communities**.

title: ‘Despite challenges, T.N. met demands of govt. employees’
content:
Tamil Nadu (T.N.) successfully fulfilled the demands of its government employees.
*   This achievement was made despite the state encountering various challenges.
*   T.N. demonstrated its ability to meet employee expectations even under difficult circumstances.

title: Police, Excise launch intensive raid in Perumbavoor; nine NDPS cases registered
content:
Police and Excise departments conducted an intensive raid.
*   The operation took place in Perumbavoor.
*   Nine NDPS (Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances) cases were registered as a result.

title: A.P. govt. signs pact with SRM-A.P. for quantum reference facility
content:
Here's a 3-bullet point summary:

*   The Andhra Pradesh government has signed an agreement with SRM University, A.P.
*   The pact is specifically for the establishment of a quantum reference facility.
*   This collaboration aims to advance quantum technology within the state.

title: Islamiah College in Tirupattur inks MOU
